Articles.Content:
So perhaps you've seen my dragon slaying robot of destruction?

It's pretty cool, right? But there is only one tiny little problem, and that is that it doesn't actually walk. It's just a statue that you can push around with RCS and the gravity cheat. I know that there are mods available that let you build functional robots, but I'm not really all that interested in developing this thing any further myself. If any of you guys would feel like it, however, then you can download the .craft file here! It would still be fun if someone else could make it move.

http://www./view/204re1182qwkfcb/Dragon_Hunter.craft

The plates in the back can be removed as shown in this picture. I suppose there could be room for some shiftable counterweight there, or something. The joints are quite a mess, though. Just warning you.

Edited August 24, 2014 by Felsmak
I'm totally going to take a crack at this once my gundam and new iron man mod are done
